Parameters: List: list containing the results of @B_android#media#AudioManager#getActiveRecordingConfigurations_E@.
onRecordingConfigChanged(java.util.List<.Description: Called whenever the device recording configuration has changed.

ClassDesc: Interface for receiving update notifications about the recording configuration. Extend this abstract class and register it with @B_android#media#AudioManager#registerAudioRecordingCallback_E@ to be notified. Use @B_android#media#AudioManager#getActiveRecordingConfigurations_E@ to query the current configuration.
